name: Streets of Rage 2X
summary: Remake of the famous Beat 'Em Up series. The remaster features improved artificial intelligence, high resolution and frame rate, new abilities, the ability to block, aerial combo attacks, and much more. Of the innovations, the developers note a cooperative mode for up to 4 people.
